pages.title: Pipevine Swallowtail
pages.text: Battus philenor, the pipevine swallowtail or blue swallowtail, is a swallowtail butterfly found in North America and Central America.$(br2)This butterfly is black with iridescent-blue hindwings.$(br2)They are found in many different habitats, but are most commonly found in forests.

pages.title: Pipevine Swallowtail
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
